mapper.insert: insert into study (study_title, study_leader_id, study_status, study_introduction, study_startdate, study_enddate, study_goals, study_type, study_user_min, study_user_max, study_content, study_place, study_category_id, study_view, study_registdate) value (#{studyTitle}, #{studyLeaderId}, #{studyStatus}, #{studyIntroduction}, #{studyStartdate}, #{studyEnddate}, #{studyGoals}, #{studyType}, #{studyUserMin}, #{studyUserMax},#{studyContent}, #{studyPlace},#{studyCategoryId}, #{studyView}, #{studyRegistdate});
insert into user_join_study (user_id, study_id, user_status) value (#{userId}, #{studyId}, #{userStatus})
mapper.select: select count(*) from study where study_id = #{studyId} and study_leader_id = #{userId}
